vote.title: Authorize the First Amendment No. 1 to and Restatement of the Development Participation Contract with the Texas Trees Foundation for the donation of privately funded design plans for a City of Dallas 2017 General Obligation Bond Program Project identified as the Southwestern Medical District Streetscape Plan/Harry Hines Boulevard Improvements (Market Center DART Station to Mockingbird Lane) project to (1) revise the scope of work to separate the Infrastructure Design component from the Project Enhancement Design component; and (2) identify the responsible parties of each project component - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
vote.description: Authorize the First Amendment No. 1 to and Restatement of the Development Participation Contract with the Texas Trees Foundation for the donation of privately funded design plans for a City of Dallas 2017 General Obligation Bond Program Project identified as the Southwestern Medical District Streetscape Plan/Harry Hines Boulevard Improvements (Market Center DART Station to Mockingbird Lane) project to (1) revise the scope of work to separate the Infrastructure Design component from the Project Enhancement Design component; and (2) identify the responsible parties of each project component - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
